name.description: The name of the PLT event

w3cResponseEnd.description: Time to get the aspx from the server

prefetchStart.description: Time it takes for our app to *start* prefetching

appStart.description: Time it takes for our app to *start* running

preRender.description: Time it takes for our app to make the relevant data fetch for this view

dataFetch.description: Time it takes for our app to get data back from the server

dataFetchServerTime.description: time the datafetch request spent on the server

postRender.description: Time it takes from appDataFetchEnd to PLT

httpRequests.description: The count of http request till plt

appCacheHit.description: Whether this page load is served from appCache
